attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is seems that in this country many business and corporations get away with manslaughter, theft, fraud and many other crimes for which people may spend years in prison if caught. The Bill on Corporate manslaughter is a step in the right directtion but much more needs to be done on this subject. 
This is important because the harm cause by a corporation is much bigger then any individual can ever cause. 
A recent example is the bird flue out break at bernhard matthews.
